questions.question: Considering the overall design, what is the dominant style of this footwear?

Describe the shape of the shoe's sole, focusing on its profile from the side view.
What color is the heel collar, contrasting with the main body color?
What is the predominant color of the midsole, which forms the base of the shoe?

Considering the structure, does this shoe have laces or a similar fastening system?
What is the visible texture of the knit material used in the upper part of the shoe?
